page.title: 17Adult Recreation cont.
page.content: I go to discos regularly. Lisa Clarke age 11. My Mum plays bridge and she sometimes goes to the theatre. My Dad has an expensive camera and takes lots of pictures. Haydn Evans aged 11. In the Village Hall people play skittles. Clare Humphries age 11. My Mum likes taking the dog for walks. My Dad likes decorating the house and making all sorts of things in wood like garden furniture. Caroline Millar. age 10. Me and my Dad go Greyhound Racing We have got a greyhound for a pet Michael Stuart. age 10. My Mum likes watching Wimbledon Tennis on T.V. and my Dad likes watch- ing football. Ruth Whitaker age 10. My Mum likes reading books and going to pubs. My Dad plays golf and snooker. Andrew Strickland age 10.
